title: The One About Fitness
description:
On this week's episode Bob and Monet talk about all things fitness! From the different health regimes they've had throughout their life, their current fitness goals, and much much more!
This episode is sponsored by Buttah. Buttah's so confident that it works, they're giving away their best selling sample kit for FREE. To get your FREE samples, go to ButtahSkin.com and use code "Glowup" at check out.
Everlywell is offering a special discount of 20% off an at-home lab test to Sibling Rivalry listeners at everlywell.com/rivalry
Go to rivalry.myfitnesspal.com and use code RIVALRY to get a one-month premium membership for FREE!
Go to everlane.com/RIVALRY and sign up for 10% off your first order plus free shipping.
New customers can save 10% on their first purchase by going to TruNiagen.com/rivalry and use code rivalry!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
